duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and maintain online resources. Reach out to and educate building owners and managers.
Track program outcomes and organize regular check-ins with utility partners and other stakeholders.
Analyze building energy and greenhouse gas emissions data. Present information to property owners and members of the public.
Support ordinance reporting and enforcement including monitoring compliance.
Oversee a technical help desk service managed primarily by consultants.
Engage with a consultant on maintenance of an electronic data and communications platform.
Perform related duties to support creative and effective approaches to reducing greenhouse gas emissions in Cambridge. Engage with other departments on development of policy and strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Environmental Planning, Sustainability, or a related field (Master's preferred)
